alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Iowa; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, northwestern Dubuque, Benton, northwestern Jones, Delaware, northern Linn and northwestern Iowa Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1225 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aurora to near Rock Creek Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winthrop and Aurora around 1230 AM CDT. Lamont and Masonville around 1235 AM CDT. Dundee around 1240 AM CDT. Manchester around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Edgewood, Greeley, Oneida, Victor and Colesburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 215. Interstate 380 between mile markers 24 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Iowa; Jones; Linn
